GetAntiPattern.name: GetAntiPattern
GetAntiPattern.description: Grants permission to get details of each anti pattern that collector should look at in a customer's environment

GetApplicationComponentDetails.name: GetApplicationComponentDetails
GetApplicationComponentDetails.description: Grants permission to get details of an application

GetApplicationComponentStrategies.name: GetApplicationComponentStrategies
GetApplicationComponentStrategies.description: Grants permission to get a list of all recommended strategies and tools for an application running in a server

GetAssessment.name: GetAssessment
GetAssessment.description: Grants permission to retrieve status of an on-going assessment

GetImportFileTask.name: GetImportFileTask
GetImportFileTask.description: Grants permission to get details of a specific import task

GetLatestAssessmentId.name: GetLatestAssessmentId
GetLatestAssessmentId.description: Grants permission to retrieve the latest assessment id

GetMessage.name: GetMessage
GetMessage.description: Grants permission to the collector to receive information from the service

GetPortfolioPreferences.name: GetPortfolioPreferences
GetPortfolioPreferences.description: Grants permission to retrieve customer migration/Modernization preferences

GetPortfolioSummary.name: GetPortfolioSummary
GetPortfolioSummary.description: Grants permission to retrieve overall summary (number-of servers to rehost etc as well as overall number of anti patterns)

GetRecommendationReportDetails.name: GetRecommendationReportDetails
GetRecommendationReportDetails.description: Grants permission to retrieve detailed information about a recommendation report

GetServerDetails.name: GetServerDetails
GetServerDetails.description: Grants permission to get info about a specific server

GetServerStrategies.name: GetServerStrategies
GetServerStrategies.description: Grants permission to get recommended strategies and tools for a specific server

ListAnalyzableServers.name: ListAnalyzableServers
ListAnalyzableServers.description: Grants permission to get a list of all analyzable servers in a customer's vcenter environment

ListAntiPatterns.name: ListAntiPatterns
ListAntiPatterns.description: Grants permission to get a list of all anti patterns that collector should look for in a customer's environment

ListApplicationComponents.name: ListApplicationComponents
ListApplicationComponents.description: Grants permission to get a list of all applications running on servers on customer's servers

ListCollectors.name: ListCollectors
ListCollectors.description: Grants permission to get a list of all collectors installed by the customer

ListImportFileTask.name: ListImportFileTask
ListImportFileTask.description: Grants permission to get list of all imports performed by the customer

ListJarArtifacts.name: ListJarArtifacts
ListJarArtifacts.description: Grants permission to get a list of binaries that collector should assess

ListServers.name: ListServers
ListServers.description: Grants permission to get a list of all servers in a customer's environment

PutLogData.name: PutLogData
PutLogData.description: Grants permission to the collector to send logs to the service

PutMetricData.name: PutMetricData
PutMetricData.description: Grants permission to the collector to send metrics to the service

PutPortfolioPreferences.name: PutPortfolioPreferences
PutPortfolioPreferences.description: Grants permission to save customer's Migration/Modernization preferences

RegisterCollector.name: RegisterCollector
RegisterCollector.description: Grants permission to register the collector to receive an ID and to start receiving messages from the service

SendMessage.name: SendMessage
SendMessage.description: Grants permission to the collector to send information to the service

StartAssessment.name: StartAssessment
StartAssessment.description: Grants permission to start assessment in a customer's environment (collect data from all servers and provide recommendations)

StartImportFileTask.name: StartImportFileTask
StartImportFileTask.description: Grants permission to start importing data from a file provided by customer

StartRecommendationReportGeneration.name: StartRecommendationReportGeneration
StartRecommendationReportGeneration.description: Grants permission to start generating a recommendation report

StopAssessment.name: StopAssessment
StopAssessment.description: Grants permission to stop an on-going assessment

UpdateApplicationComponentConfig.name: UpdateApplicationComponentConfig
UpdateApplicationComponentConfig.description: Grants permission to update details for an application

UpdateCollectorConfiguration.name: UpdateCollectorConfiguration
UpdateCollectorConfiguration.description: Grants permission to the collector to send configuration information to the service

UpdateServerConfig.name: UpdateServerConfig
UpdateServerConfig.description: Grants permission to update info on a server along with the recommended strategy
